A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie ruined the Star Wars saga. Completely took a dump on fans and through everything out the window that was set up in the previous movie. Also defies and ignores the first six movies of continuity. Rian Johnson seems to think he’s making his own Sci-Fi movies instead of continuing a story line spread across 30 years. If you like Star Wars but haven’t seen this movie\, don’t even bother. You won’t miss out on anything\, it’ll just confuse you.
